titleStmt.title: A peaceable enquiry into that novel controversie about reordination With certain close, but candid animadversions upon an ingenious tract for the lawfulness of reordination; written by the learned and Reverend Mr. J. Humphrey. By R.I.
titleStmt.author: I. R.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Dr. Williams' Library, London.
